title: (x) Endless - calligraphy style - Espresso {Mark S}
content:
Can someone please ID this typestyle. WTF would not work on it due to severe dithering

comments.content: I would say it is Renaissance, italic.
How ironic, from the Calligraphics foundry. thanks
